text.tspan: Primary energy consumption by world region

Primary energy
consumption is measured in
terawatt-hours
, using the
substitution method
.
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)
Note: The data includes only commercially-traded fuels (coal, oil, gas), nuclear and modern renewables used in electricity production, but not
